item.title: PyData Berlin 2019: Gaussian Processes for Time Series Forecasting (scikit-learn)
item.description: In this notebook we run some experiments to demonstrate how we can use Gaussian Processes in the context of time series forecasting with scikit-learn. This material is part of a talk on Gaussian Process for Time Series Analysis presented at the PyCon DE & PyData 2019 Conference in Berlin. Update: Additional material and plots were included for the Second Symposium on Machine Learning and Dynamical Systems at The Fields Institute (virtual event).
